title: CIO
description: The metadata format for listing bureau CIOs.

@type.title: Metadata Context
@type.description: IRI for the JSON-LD data type. This should be cio?

bureauCode.title: Bureau Code
bureauCode.description: Federal agencies, combined agency and bureau code from OMB Circular A-11, Appendix C in the format of 015:010.

positionTitleDescription.title: Job Title
positionTitleDescription.description: Official classification title description of the position of the employee.

emplomentTypeCode.title: Employment Type Code
emplomentTypeCode.description: (e.g. GS, SES, SL, ST, etc.)  The closest element from OPM is Pay Plan except no ST: A particular table or array of pay rates prescribed by law or other authoritative source that establishes the basic pay rates for certain employees.

appointmentTypeCode.title: Appointment Type Code
appointmentTypeCode.description: The type of appointment under which an employee is serving.

otherResponsibilities.title: Other Responsibilities
otherResponsibilities.description: (e.g. full-time CIO or combination CIO/CFO), should this be an array?

evaluationReviewingOfficialTitle.title: Rating Official
evaluationReviewingOfficialTitle.description: If a “reviewing official” is used, describe their title.

keyBureauIndicator.title: Key Bureau Indicator
keyBureauIndicator.description: Indicate whether this position is designated by the agency CIO as a “key bureau CIO.” Agency CIOs must provide key bureau CIOs’ rating officials input into the agency-wide critical element(s) described in N1 of the FITARA Common Baseline.
